name: travisSHARK
author: Fabian Trautsch
description: Collects information from the Travis CI.

arguments.name: plugin_path
arguments.description: path to root folder of plugin

arguments.name: plugin_path
arguments.description: path to the root folder of the plugin

arguments.name: project_name
arguments.description: name of the project

arguments.name: db_user
arguments.description: database user for the mongodb

arguments.name: db_password
arguments.description: password for the user of the mongodb

arguments.name: db_database
arguments.description: name of the database in the mongodb

arguments.name: db_hostname
arguments.description: hostname of the server, where the mongodb runs on

arguments.name: db_port
arguments.description: port on which the mongodb is listening on

arguments.name: db_authentication
arguments.description: databse against which users are authenticated

arguments.name: ssl_enabled
arguments.description: needs to be set if database uses ssl connection

arguments.name: repository_url
arguments.description: url of the project

arguments.name: proxy_host
arguments.description: host to the proxy, if used

arguments.name: proxy_port
arguments.description: port of the proxy

arguments.name: proxy_password
arguments.description: password of the proxy

arguments.name: proxy_user
arguments.description: user of the proxy

arguments.name: log_level
arguments.description: debug choices (INFO, DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR)

arguments.name: token
arguments.description: token to use for api requests

arguments.name: ignore_errors
arguments.description: switch on, if errors should be ignored

arguments.name: only_failed
arguments.description: switch on, if you only want to mine failed jobs

arguments.name: rerun
arguments.description: switch on, if you want to rerun on all builds
